attributes.action: The total ban of fireworks in th uk except organised events
attributes.additional_details:
The reasons are obvious to me and many others . Fireworks  are bigger louder than ever before. To the point that there NOT for letting off around gardens streets farms etc. The effect on animals the elderly is immense. 
Its so distressing  to see the effects on an animal that is scared to death that it will just run wildly to attempt to get away.      The days of the sparkler and a standard firework are gone these things are like bombs going off...... Time it stopped
attributes.background: I want total ban on the sale or use of fireworks except organised events.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
